description: Class D sedan with all-wheel drive. The seventh generation of the model. The car debuted at the Chicago Auto Show in February 2019.
overview: Legacy is built on the SGB (Subaru Global Platform) global platform. As a result, the body of the sedan became stronger, the torsional and bending rigidity increased, the weight decreased, the rolling resistance improved, the steering became sharper. Outwardly, the car retained its recognizability, although it began to look stricter and more dynamic. Except for the length increased by 38 mm (4840), Subaru Legacy managed to maintain the same dimensions: wheelbase - 2750 mm, width - 1840 mm, height - 1500 mm. The interior features a new vertically positioned 11.6-inch Starlink multimedia touchscreen with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto support. Most of the functions and settings are sewn into it. At the same time, the manufacturer still retained a number of physical keys and knobs - for many this is a pleasant plus.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
